activities:
Subjective Metrics, Inc. (“SubMet”) hosts Waypoint, a web-based system that helps educators (1) create better feedback for students on authentic tasks such as writing assignments and oral presentations, and (2) deploy course evaluations and other types of surveys to gather feedback from students.  Waypoint captures all of this feedback as both qualitative and quantitative assessment data on student and institutional performance.
Therefore, all of SubMet’s activities with respect to personal information received from the EU relate to student performance in education.
recoursemech: SubMet participates in BBB Online’s private sector dispute resolution program.
